original_text: Some widows are really alone and they have nobody to take care of them. A widow like that trusts God that he will help her. As a result, she prays a lot, at night and during the day, and she asks God to help her.
korean_text: 참 과부로서 외로운 자는 하나님께 소망을 두어 주야로 항상 간구와 기도를 하거니와

sentences.original_text: and they have nobody to take care of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 돌볼 사람이 아무도 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: A widow like that trusts God
As a result, she prays a lot,
at night and during the day,
and she asks God to help her.
